description.value:
Your mastery of movement and dance allows you to learn spells that embellish your flow across the battlefield. You can prepare these spells when you are the appropriate bard level.

Spell LevelSpells
1st@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplJump000000]{Jump}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplZephyrStri]{Zephyr Strike}
2nd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlur000000]{Blur}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSpiderClim]{Spider Climb}
3rd@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHaste00000]{Haste}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThunderSte]{Thunder Step}
4th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominateBe]{Dominate Beast}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplStoneskin0]{Stoneskin}
5th@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplArcaneHand]{Arcane Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplFarStep000]{Far Step}
